'''Ecofeminism''' is a biocentric, environmental movement with cultural and social concerns. The movement acknowledges a relationship between the oppression of women and the degradation of [[Natural environment|nature]]. Ecofeminist theorists consider the interconnections between sexism, the [[Dominator culture|domination of nature]], animals, racism and other social inequalities.
